citations.narrative:
Three disposition forms for dogs did not have the address for the person/business receiving the dogs. The name and
address of the person whom a dog is sold or given is required to be written on the disposition form and can be important
in animal health tracking. Ensure to record this required information on disposition forms (APHIS 7006).
***Correct from 6/28/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1)(iv) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Three disposition forms for dogs did not have the address for the person/business receiving the dogs. The name and 
address of the person whom a dog is sold or given is required to be written on the disposition form and can be important 
in animal health tracking. Ensure to record this required information on disposition forms (APHIS 7006).  
***Correct from 6/28/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
